skills.skill: Real Estate and Property Management Experience

duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and continue to develop accounting department.
Work with all department on financial and financial operational issues.
Own all aspects of financial operations, including monthly third-party financial reporting.
Review of annual budgets and annual commercial CAM reconciliations.
Implement on-boarding of new clients and properties.
Prepare proper filings for governmental agencies and oversee all annual audits.
Build on and continue to improve monthly financial reporting, budgeting and financial operational processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in finance, accounting, business administration or a related field. CPA preferred.
